name: New Retro Pong
description:
Synthwave-style circular Pong.

Up to four local players can play. You can play solo with your mouse as well.

Made in less than 24h for the Global Game Jam 2017.

Credits

Game by Jonathan Giroux

" Night Pulse" by PlayOnLoop.com, Licensed under Creative Commons By Attribution 4.0, http://www.playonloop.com/2015-music-loops/night-p...
